items.sentence: Whoever said money can\'t buy happiness simply didn\'t know where to go shopping.
Even though I gave Tom detailed instructions, he wasn\'t able to do it correctly.
Tom thought that Mary wanted him to kiss her, but he wasn\'t sure, so he didn\'t.
It\'s not that I don\'t want to go, it\'s just that it\'s not a good time for me.
The police searched Tom\'s house for three hours, but they didn\'t find anything.
